name: Glass Cannon (JohnyWuijtsNL)
description:
Shoot the enemies and pick up the powerups to survive as long as possible!

This is the first game I ever finished, around 2019.

I used GameMaker Studio 2 (which I no longer recommend, since it works on a monthly subscription now).

All the code, graphics, music and sfx are made by me. Except for the font of course.

I made the music and sfx using Bosca Ceoil:

https://boscaceoil.net/
